author: nsmith-
body:
This is a backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35296 which validates the backport of the correctionlib external in cmsdist https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/7523
It provides only C++ and python 2 functionality. The `correction` CLI utility and python 3 bindings are omitted for now, as the intention here is only to provide legacy support for python 2 nanoAOD-tools.

This will need testing with the externals including https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/7523
title: Add a unit test for correctionlib external
